synopsis.text: Mika Katagiri dreams of having her band perform at the upcoming local music festival. However, they face multiple obstacles that threaten their participation. Their keyboardist Jun unexpectedly quits the band, leaving them without a vital member. Additionally, the stage they were promised has been taken away by the mayor. Despite these setbacks, Mika refuses to abandon their goal of playing at the festival. Rallying her remaining bandmates, they desperately brainstorm solutions, exploring any option to secure a slot at the event. Their dedication is fueled both by their passion for music as well as their youthful ambition. As the festival date approaches, the band races against time, overcoming roadblocks through resourcefulness and perseverance. They reach out to friends and local contacts, pulling together makeshift instruments and equipment. Though the path is difficult, their camaraderie and belief in their musical talents carries them forward. Will Mika and her band finally get their long-awaited chance under the lights at the festival? Their journey speaks to the resilience of chasing one's dreams, against all odds.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
